1,Verify Checkout Process and Inventory Page Navigation,Navigate to the inventory page after logging in. Add an item to the cart and proceed through the checkout process. Verify the inventory page.,"Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 3: Click on link 'item 3 title link' -> Navigate to page 'inventory-item.html'
Step 4: Click on button 'add-to-cart'
Step 5: Click on link '2'
Step 6: Proceed through checkout process

column2: - Step 1: Click on button 'checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
- Step 2: Click on input field 'firstName'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'firstName'
- Step 4: Click on input field 'lastName'
- Step 5: Enter input value in input field 'lastName'
- Step 6: Click on input field 'postalCode'
- Step 7: Enter input value in input field 'postalCode'
- Step 8: Click on input field 'continue'

column1: Step 7: Click on button 'finish' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-complete.html'
Step 8: Click on button 'back-to-products' -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
